Package io.github.ai4ci.util

package io.github.ai4ci.util

  • Class
    Description
    AtomicDouble
    A small atomic holder for a double value.
    AtomicDoubleArray
    A double array in which elements may be updated atomically.
    Binomial
    Represents a binomial proportion with numerator and denominator counts.
    Binomial.Confidence
    Represents a confidence interval for a binomial proportion.
    Cloner
    Utility for performing deep object copying via serialisation.
    Cloner.FastByteArrayInputStream
    High-performance byte array input stream without synchronisation overhead.
    Cloner.FastByteArrayOutputStream
    High-performance byte array output stream with geometric buffer growth.
    Cloner.MockOutputStream
    Stream implementation for size estimation without actual data storage.
    Conversions
    Utility class providing mathematical conversions for probability, rates, and odds transformations.
    CSVUtil<X extends OutputWriter.Writeable>
    Utility class for converting objects to CSV format.
    DuckDBUtil
    Utility class for DuckDB database operations and type mapping.
    Ephemeral<T>
    An optional value that is serializable.
    ExoticDistributions
    Utility class for generating and working with exotic distributions.
    Factor
    Interface for factors that can be represented as enums with optional level labels.
    Factor.Level
    Annotation for specifying a custom label for an enum constant.
    Inversion<Y,X>
    Given a stream of objects of type X, and a mapping that extracts objects of type Y, this class creates an index of type Y and acts as a function for retrieving the set of X which map to Y.
    Memoised<X,Y>
    Memoised is a utility class that implements memoization for a given function.
    PauseableThread
    A pauseable daemon thread which will can be required to go into a waiting state after each execution of the loop.
    ProbabilityScaler
    Utility class for scaling probabilities using power transformations.
    ReflectionUtils
    Many of these utilities could be switched for immutable datatype approaches which would use code generation rather than reflection.
    Repository
    A reflection based data indexed repository class with support for foreign keys for data imported from multiple CSV files.
    Repository.CSVReader<X>
    A CSV reader that reads a CSV file into a map of column name to value, converting to the expected type based on the builder setters of the class.
    Repository.FunctionKey<X,Y>
    A key generated from the serialization of a lambda function.
    Repository.Indexed<Y extends Repository.Indexed<Y>>
    An interface for entities that can be indexed in the repository.
    Repository.RepositoryIndex
    Repository index that holds ValueIndex instances for different key types.
    Repository.SerializableFunction<X,Y>
    A serializable function interface that extends both Serializable and Function.
    Repository.ValueIndex<Y>
    Index for a given type.
    Sampler
    A thread local random number generator provider with convenience sampling methods.
    Sampler.OutOfRangeException
    Exception thrown when a distribution parameter is out of range.
    ShallowList<X>
    Used to prevent immutables deep cloning for lists.
    SparseDecomposition
    Utilities for sparse matrix operations and spectral decomposition.
    SparseDecomposition.SparseMatrix
    Sparse matrix in coordinate (COO) form.
    SparseDecomposition.SparseMatrixBuilder
    Builder for SparseDecomposition.SparseMatrix using explicit insertion of entries.
    ThreadSafeArray<X>
    A thread-safe, dynamically growing array designed for a write-once-read-many (WORM) pattern.
    ThreadSafeArray.ReadOnlyException
    Thrown when attempting to write to a ThreadSafeArray after it has been finalized with a call to ThreadSafeArray.finish().
    ThreadSafeArray.WriteOnlyException
    Thrown when attempting to write to a ThreadSafeArray while it is being resized or finalized.
